name: Endives with Blue-cheese Dressing and Walnuts
keywords: belgian endive, black walnuts, blue cheese, chives, garlic, mayonnaise, milk, sour cream
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon coarsely chopped walnuts, preferably black walnuts

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange the endive, sliced in half lengthwise, on an individual serving dish. Spoon about two tablespoons of blue-cheese dressing over the cut halves. Sprinkle the tops with one tablespoon of chopped walnuts.
